item.title: Creature Keeper for PC launches May 8
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/03/creature-keeper-for-pc-launches-may-8

  • PC

Monster-taming RPG dated.

Monster-taming RPG Creature Keeper will launch for PC via Steam on May 8, publisher Graffiti Games and developer Fervir Games announced. A Switch version is also planned.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

Creature Keeper is a monster-taming game where you fight alongside the creatures you’ve befriended in real time. Form a party of your favorite creatures and strengthen them by cooking yummy food, crafting trinkets, earning power ups via your Pocket Garden, and nabbing unlockables from the Bestiary.

Key Features

  • A New Kind of Hero – Take up the ancient role of a Creature Keeper. A strange sickness is affecting otherwise healthy creatures and you must uncover its mysteries to restore balance to a world divided.
  • Befriend a Small Army of Creatures – Assemble your dream team by befriending a bevy of creatures to fight alongside you.
  • Strengthen Creatures with Food – Learn recipes while adventuring and cook up tasty meals to help your creatures grow in their own special way.
  • As Creatures Grow, So Do You – More knowledge = more power! Raise your party and fight corrupted creatures to unlock creature notes, skills, recipes, and more in the Bestiary.
  • Craft Equipment for Yourself and Creatures – Customize your play style by crafting a variety of weapons and trinkets with unique effects.
  • Explore the Magic of the Pocket Garden – Grow ingredients, power ups, equipment, and more with your Pocket Garden, a magical portable farm.
  • Creatures with Style – Craft fashion items such as hats, masks, and accessories for your creatures to wear!

Watch a new trailer below.

PC Release Date Trailer

item.title: Empyreal launches May 8
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/03/empyreal-launches-may-8

  • PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

Seven-minute game overview trailer released.

Action RPG Empyreal will launch for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam on May 8, publisher Secret Mode and developer Silent Games announced.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

Empyreal is a complex, challenging, feature-rich action RPG.

In a far-flung corner of the galaxy an Expedition arrives on a hitherto unexplored planet to find a colossal Monolith built by a lost civilization. These are no mere ruins: the Monolith is filled with danger, and the Expedition is ill-equipped to unearth the secrets within.

All eyes turn towards an elite mercenary who may succeed where all others have failed.

Venture inside the Monolith and face the automatons that yet remain, remnants of the impossibly ancient civilization that built this unknowable structure. Survive and uncover revelations that transform our understanding of humanity itself.

Key Features

  • Stand against formidable foes; your only hope of victory lies in mastering a unique and complex combat system.
  • A memorable cast of characters, with personal questlines and multiple endings for each one.
  • A beautiful but shattered ancient world. Explore breathtaking environments filled with hidden details.
  • Customize your character with a vast array of equipment and collect armor sets that confer powerful bonuses.
  • Upgrade and modify the loot you find.
  • Unlock new abilities to personalize your playstyle.

Watch a new trailer below.

Game Overview Trailer

item.title: Retro-style survival horror game Ghost Sector announced for PC
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/03/retro-style-survival-horror-game-ghost-sector-announced-for-pc

  • PC

Due out in early 2026.

Publisher GIGATANK 3000 and developer Polygon Crypt have announced Polygon Crypt, a retro-style survival horror game coming to PC via Steam and Epic Games Store in early 2026.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

Ghost Sector is a survival horror game where you play as M-07, a prototype machine trapped in a cybernetic facility during lockdown. Outwit the automated defenses, search for answers to your origin uncovering secrets, solving puzzles, and upgrade your abilities while preserving your finite energy.

Step into the research complex on planet RX-712, once maximum security prison has now transformed into an advanced research station when a discovery of valuable minerals is unearthed. As the forefront of cybernetic robotic technology, the M-Tech Corporation converted the derelict prison into a massive robotic research facility. Now a hotbed of experimental nanotechnology and human robot replica research pushed beyond ethical limits.

You awaken as M-07 a machine prototype with an unexplained anomaly at its core after a disastrous event awakens you. The entire complex is in lockdown and the automated defense systems have been activated. Search the facility, defeat the defense systems in place, recover your memories, and unravel the origin of your creation and the M-Tech Corporation.

Story

It’s cold and sterile. Power is running low. Everything is a blur of fragmented commands and half-remembered routines. Something went wrong, the facility is on lock down. Break from confinement and search the complex for answers. The truth lingers just out of reach but something compels you to move forward and find out who, and what you are.

Puzzles and Mechanics

  • Classic Controls – Navigate using fixed-camera angles and tank-style controls, evoking the feel of retro survival horror classics.
  • Resource Management – Begin defenseless with a limited power source. Scavenge for modules that upgrade your abilities—from a stronger power core and cybernetic shield to eventually arming you for combat.
  • Strategic Encounters – Use your wits to solve intricate environmental puzzles while avoiding or outsmarting hostile defenses and lurking enemies. Every upgrade is a double-edged sword, enhancing your capabilities while depleting your finite energy reserves.

Aesthetics

  • Visual Options – While the default experience celebrates retro visuals, customizable options let you dial back the nostalgia for a slightly modernized presentation.
  • Inspirational Homage – Drawing artistic inspiration from the haunting ambiance of Galerians, the mysterious vibe of BioForge, the melancholic isolation of Amiga classics like Citadel, and the eerie aesthetics of the Alien films and Alien Breed: Tower Assault, every pixel and shadow is crafted to immerse you in an unsettling blend of futuristic decay and retro horror.

Watch the announcement trailer below.

Announce Trailer

item.title: Missile Command Delta announced for PS5, Switch, and PC
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/03/missile-command-delta-announced-for-ps5-switch-and-pc

  • PC
  • PS5
  • Switch

Developed by Mighty Yell and 13AM Games. Due out in 2025.

Publisher Atari and developers Mighty Yell and 13AM Games have announced Missile Command Delta, a reimagining of Atari’s 1980s missile defense arcade classic as a turn-based tactical game, for PlayStation 5, Switch, and PC (Steam). It will launch in 2025.

“While Missile Command Delta approaches gameplay in a completely new way, it retains all the tension and suspense of the arcade original,” said Atari vice president of games Ethan Stearns in a press release. “You have to think strategically about every move you make because even one poor choice can have grave consequences.”

Stearns continued, “Missile Command Delta has a little something for every kind of player—whether you love strategy tactics games, are a mystery fan, a secret hunting completionist, or you just love to explore and solve puzzles. We can’t wait for players to get their hands on the game later this year.”

Here is an overview of the game, via Atari:

Missile Command Delta reimagines Atari’s 1980s missile defense arcade classic as a turn-based tactical game set against a mysterious narrative that leaves you questioning whether you’re trapped in a simulation or truly defending cities from attack.

As players explore an abandoned half-century old facility they will encounter locked doors, dishevelled work rooms, massive super computers and newly awakened missile command terminals. Players must defend against waves of missiles from an unknown enemy using a battery of missiles, each with its own unique type, range, and explosion size. Only by managing their arsenal carefully will they have enough firepower to clear the skies.

As enemy attacks increase and pressure mounts, relationships will be put to the test, blurring the lines between what is real and who they can trust. If they succeed, they may even learn the truth behind this Cold War defense program.

Watch the announcement trailer below.

Announce Trailer

item.title: 3D platformer Foldy’s OS Quest announced for PC
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/03/3d-platformer-foldys-os-quest-announced-for-pc

  • PC

Run, jump, zip, surf, and stomp your way through a digital world.

Developer Vacation Home has announced Foldy’s OS Quest, a 3D platformer set in a colorful, computerized world. It will be available for PC via Steam. A release date was not announced.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

The first game from Vacation Home, Foldy’s OS Quest invites players into a colorful computerized world for an action-packed 3D platforming adventure like no other!

Foldy is a carefree anti-virus file folder, living blissfully on the Digital Desktop. But when a massive virus invades his peaceful operating system, spreading its influence to all corners of his world, Foldy must spring into action with the help of his newfound companion, Mouse!

Run, jump, zip, surf, and stomp your way through levels inspired by the magical world of personal computing, and take down the virus before it can break through the Firewall!

Key Features

  • Explore seven uniquely themed levels, each one based around a unique corner of Foldy’s digital world, from desktop games to social media and even down into the darkest depths of the Recycle Bin!
  • Pick up collectibles to unlock challenging bonus levels, the ultimate test of your skills!
  • Return to previously cleared levels to try your hand at Time Trials, and unlock new moves to bring your times down even further!

Watch the announcement trailer below.

Announce Trailer
